front.title: Deprecating MD5 and SHA-1 Signature Hashes in TLS 1.2 and DTLS 1.2

abstract.t: The MD5 and SHA-1 hashing algorithms are increasingly vulnerable to attack, and this document deprecates their use in TLS 1.2 and DTLS 1.2 digital signatures. However, this document does not deprecate SHA-1 with Hashed Message Authentication Code (HMAC), as used in record protection. This document updates RFC 5246.
